QuestData.Title: What Might Have Been
QuestData.Description: <Velen continues to stare at the statue as he speaks.>$b$bThousands of years ago, when I was young, I made a choice.$b$bA choice that allowed my world to fall to ruin. A choice that made my people exiles. A choice that forever separated me from my beloved brothers.$b$b<Velen shakes his head.>$b$bI cannot leave, not yet. Not until I have had a chance to reflect.
QuestData.RewardText: <Prophet Velen peers solemnly at you.>$b$bThank you.
